metadata.name: Poetry
metadata.description:
This animation is based on a photograph of a famous poetess Anna Akhmatova, and her poem "Creativity".

The original photo was taken by a master Moses Nappelbaum. I got permission from his great-grandson to work with this heritage material.

The artwork consists of 30 frames, each of which is hand-painted with watercolor and gouache.

Created by Proportio in 2021.
